Home > Archives > 使用Jquery-Validation插件进行前端验证

使用Jquery-Validation插件进行前端验证

Publish: December 15, 2015

Introduction

This jQuery plugin makes simple clientside form validation easy, whilst still offering plenty of customization options. It makes a good choice if you’re building something new from scratch, but also when you’re trying to integrate something into an existing application with lots of existing markup. The plugin comes bundled with a useful set of validation methods, including URL and email validation, while providing an API to write your own methods. All bundled methods come with default error messages in english and translations into 37 other languages.

导入js和css

1 <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="screen" href="css/screen.css" />
2 <script src="../lib/jquery.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
3 <script src="../jquery.validate.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
4 <script src="../additional-methods.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

方法

序号 规则 描述
1 required:true 必须输入的字段。
2 remote:"check.php" 使用 ajax 方法调用 check.php 验证输入值。
3 email:true 必须输入正确格式的电子邮件。
4 url:true 必须输入正确格式的网址。
5 date:true 必须输入正确格式的日期。日期校验 ie6 出错，慎用。
6 dateISO:true 必须输入正确格式的日期（ISO），例如：2009-06-23，1998/01/22。只验证格式，不验证有效性。
7 number:true 必须输入合法的数字（负数，小数）。
8 digits:true 必须输入整数。
9 creditcard: 必须输入合法的信用卡号。
10 equalTo:"#field" 输入值必须和 #field 相同。
11 accept: 输入拥有合法后缀名的字符串（上传文件的后缀）。
12 maxlength:5 输入长度最多是 5 的字符串（汉字算一个字符）。
13 minlength:10 输入长度最小是 10 的字符串（汉字算一个字符）。
14 rangelength:[5,10] 输入长度必须介于 5 和 10 之间的字符串（汉字算一个字符）。
15 range:[5,10] 输入值必须介于 5 和 10 之间。
16 max:5 输入值不能大于 5。
17 min:10 输入值不能小于 10。

使用实例

1.在页面中写js，每个步骤都验证。

Description: Makes the element require a given value range.

  • Example:
 1 <h1 id="banner"><a href="http://bassistance.de/jquery-plugins/jquery-plugin-validation/">jQuery Validation Plugin</a> Demo</h1>
 2 <div id="main">
 3 
 4 <form id="myform1">
 5 <label for="field">Required, length 11: </label>
 6 <input type="text" class="left" id="field" name="field">
 7 <br/>
 8 <input type="submit" value="Validate!">
 9 </form>
10 <script type="text/javascript">
11 $.validator.setDefaults({
12 	submitHandler: function() { alert("submitted!"); }
13 });
14 $( "#myform1" ).validate({
15   rules: {
16     field: {
17       required: true,
18       rangelength: [11, 11]
19     }
20   }
21 });
22 </script>

jQuery Validation Plugin Demo 1


Description: Ensures a given number of fields in a group are complete.

  • Example:
 1 <form id="myform2">
 2 <label for="mobile_phone">Mobile phone: </label>
 3 <input class="left phone-group" id="mobile_phone" name="mobile_phone">
 4 <br/>
 5 <label for="home_phone">Home phone: </label>
 6 <input class="left phone-group" id="home_phone" name="home_phone">
 7 <br/>
 8 <label for="work_phone">Work phone: </label>
 9 <input class="left phone-group" id="work_phone" name="work_phone">
10 <br/>
11 <input type="submit" value="Validate!">
12 </form>
13 <script type="text/javascript">
14 $( "#myform2" ).validate({
15   rules: {
16     mobile_phone: {
17       require_from_group: [11, ".phone-group"]
18     },
19     home_phone: {
20       require_from_group: [1, ".phone-group"]
21     },
22     work_phone: {
23       require_from_group: [1, ".phone-group"]
24     }
25   }
26 });
27 </script>

jQuery Validation Plugin Demo 2

Default submitHandler is set to display an alert into of submitting the form




Description: Complex form1.

  • Example:
 1 <form class="cmxform" id="commentForm" method="get" action="">
 2 	<fieldset>
 3 		<legend>Please provide your name, email address (won't be published) and a comment</legend>
 4 		<p>
 5 			<label for="cname">Name (required, at least 2 characters)</label>
 6 			<input id="cname" name="name" minlength="2" type="text" required />
 7 		<p>
 8 			<label for="cemail">E-Mail (required)</label>
 9 			<input id="cemail" type="email" name="email" required />
10 		</p>
11 		<p>
12 			<label for="curl">URL (optional)</label>
13 			<input id="curl" type="url" name="url" />
14 		</p>
15 		<p>
16 			<label for="ccomment">Your comment (required)</label>
17 			<textarea id="ccomment" name="comment" required></textarea>
18 		</p>
19 		
20 	</fieldset>
21 </form>
22 <p>
23 			<input id="submit"   class="submit" type="submit" value="Submit"/>
24 		</p>
25 <script type="text/javascript">
26 $.validator.setDefaults({
27 	submitHandler: function() { alert("submitted!"); }
28 });
29 $("#commentForm").validate();
30 </script>

jQuery Validation Plugin Demo 3

Please provide your name, email address (won't be published) and a comment

2.使用公共方法，调用公共js.

　　在主页面的js中加入验证方法，在子页面提交调用通用方法验证。所以在提交时才会出现验证，输入时不验证。

  • js中使用通用方法
 1 //解决表单提交回传刷新问题
 2 //使用默认validate判断
 3 <script>
 4 function submitFormByDivAndUrlDefaultValidate(form, divid, urlret) {
 5 	var datastr = $(form).serialize();
 6 	var urlstr = $(form).attr("attr_href");
 7 	var form1 = $(form);
 8 	if (!urlstr) {
 9 		return false;
10 	}
11 /*	jQuery.validator.setDefaults({
12 		  debug: true,
13 		  success: "valid"
14 		});*/
15 	$.validator.setDefaults({
16 		debug: true
17 	});
18 	form1.validate();
19 /*	alert(datastr + "##1" + urlstr + "##1" +"form valid:"+form1.valid());*/
20 	if(form1.valid()){
21 		jQuery
22 		.ajax({
23 			global : false,
24 			type : 'POST',
25 			contentType : 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=UTF-8',
26 			url : urlstr,
27 			// data:"keywords="+$('#keywords').val()+"&courseId_key="+$('#courseId_key').val(),
28 			data : datastr,
29 			error : function() {
30 				layer.msg('操作异常！', {
31 					offset : 20,
32 					shift : 6
33 				});
34 			},
35 			// 将list数据放入div中
36 			success : function() {
37 				layer.open({
38 					content : "操作成功！",
39 					scrollbar : false
40 				});
41 				$('#' + divid).load(urlret);
42 			}
43 		});
44 	}
45 	else{
46 		layer.msg('请正确填写表单！', {
47 			offset : 20,
48 			shift : 6
49 		});
50 	}
51 }
52 </script>
  • 页面中使用通用标志判断（以userform为例）
 1 <form action="" attr_href="${url }" method="POST"
 2 				class="form-horizontal" id="userform">
 3 
 4 				<c:if test="${securityuser.uid != null }">
 5 					<%-- 	<form:hidden path="id" /> --%>
 6 					<input type="hidden" name="user.uid" value="${securityuser.uid } " />
 7 					<input type="hidden" name="user.id" value="${securityuser.id } " />
 8 					<input type="hidden" name="user.createTime"
 9 						value="${securityuser.createTime } " />
10 				</c:if>
11 
12 				<div class="form-group">
13 					<label class="col-xs-3 control-label no-padding-right">用户名
14 						:</label> <input class="col-xs-3" name="user.username"
15 						value="${securityuser.username}" type="text"  minlength="2"  maxlength="60" required/>*  2-60个字符<br />
16 				</div>
17 				<div class="form-group">
18 					<label class="col-xs-3 control-label no-padding-right">登录密码:</label>
19 					<input class="col-xs-3" name="user.password"
20 						value="${securityuser.password}" type="password" minlength="6"  maxlength="60" required/>*  6-60个字符<br />
21 				</div>
22 				<div class="form-group">
23 					<label class="col-xs-3 control-label no-padding-right">真实姓名
24 						:</label> <input class="col-xs-3" name="user.realname"
25 						value="${securityuser.realname}" type="text" minlength="2"  maxlength="20" required/>*  2-20个字符<br />
26 				</div>
27 <div class="form-group">
28 		<label class="col-md-3 control-label no-padding-right">性别 :</label>
29 <div class="col-md-3 no-padding-left">
30 			 <select class="form-control" name="user.sex" >
31                     <option value="男"<c:if test="${'男' eq securityuser.sex}">selected</c:if>>男</option>
32 					<option value="女"<c:if test="${'女' eq securityuser.sex}">selected</c:if>>女</option>
33 					</select>
34 		</div>	
35 		</div>
36 				<div class="form-group">
37 					<label class="col-xs-3 control-label no-padding-right">昵称:</label>
38 					<input class="col-xs-3" name="user.nickname"
39 						value="${securityuser.nickname}" type="text" /><br />
40 				</div>
41 				<div class="form-group">
42 					<label class="col-xs-3 control-label no-padding-right">邮箱:</label>
43 					<input class="col-xs-3" name="user.email" 
44 						value="${securityuser.email}" type="email" /><br />
45 				</div>
46 				<div class="form-group">
47 					<label class="col-xs-3 control-label no-padding-right">移动电话:</label>
48 					<input class="col-xs-3" name="user.mobile" 
49 						value="${securityuser.mobile}" type="text" minlength="11"  maxlength="11"  number="required" required/>*  11位电话号码
50 				</div>
51 				<div class="form-group">
52 					<label class="col-xs-3 control-label no-padding-right">地址:</label>
53 					<input class="col-xs-3" name="user.address" 
54 						value="${securityuser.address}" type="text" /><br />
55 				</div>
56 				<div class="form-group">
57 					<label class="col-xs-3 control-label no-padding-right">身份证号码:</label>
58 					<input class="col-xs-3" name="user.idcard" 
59 						value="${securityuser.idcard}" type="text" minlength="15"  maxlength="18"  number="required"/><br />
60 				</div>
61 
62 				<label class="col-xs-3 control-label no-padding-right">选择角色：</label>
63 				<div class="col-xs-9" style="text-align:left">
64 					<c:forEach var="list1" items="${securityroles}" varStatus="vs1">
65 						<label><input name="roles[${vs1.index}].id" 
66 							type="checkbox" value="<c:out value="${list1.id}"/>" /> <c:out
67 								value="${list1.name}" /></label>
68 						<c:if test="${vs1.index%5==0&&vs1.index!=0}">
69 							<br />
70 						</c:if>
71 					</c:forEach>
72 
73 
74 					<c:forEach var="list2" items="${securityuserroles}" varStatus="vs2">
75 						<label><input name="roles[${vs2.index+list1.size}].id" 
76 							type="checkbox" checked="checked" 
77 							value="<c:out value="${list2.securityRole.id}"/>" /> <c:out
78 								value="${list2.securityRole.name}" /></label>
79 					</c:forEach>
80 				</div>
81 
82 			</form>
